question: Does the use of bDMARDs during pregnancy impact neonatal development?
ideal_answer: Exposure to bDMARDs during pregnancy does not seem to interfere with post-natal development up to infancy.

snippets.text: Exposure to bDMARDs during pregnancy does not seem to interfere with post-natal development up to infancy.
Long-term follow-up data about newborns exposed to bDMARDs during pregnancy are however scarce.
